features: 【portable and foldable】The unfolding size is 11.6 * 11.6 * 11.4 inches, the folding size is 11.6 * 11.6 * 5.5 inches, the capacity is 8L, with folding clothes hanger,drainage pipe and small drain basket【Note: it is a small washer but not a dryer.Using the drain basket can shake off excess water and keep clothing from dripping, but the clothing are still damp and the washer have no drying function.】

【Washing and Application】Portable washing machine can wash 1 baby bath towel /6 underwears/8 baby clothes /12 socks at the same times. Our mini washing machine is designed for delicate and small things. Its small load can save water and electricity, but cleaning large items may damage the machine.It is suitable for Apartment, Hotel, RV, Travel, Home, Dormitory, Camping, Sickroom, etc. You can easily pack it in your luggage or backpack and wash your clothes anytime and anywhere.

【Food grade material and Blue light】Portable washer using TPE and food grade silicone material is a great choice for your personal items, baby items, patients' families! This mini washing machines own Blue light deep washing protection. Washing protection brought users cleaner socks and more healthy life. Let bacterium far away from us. These are especially important for baby.

【Simple and Convenient】8L capacity. This portable washing machine does not require installation. It comes with a hidden handle for easy carrying.At its bottom four corners, there are suction cups that can grip the ground. The control panel has three levels to choose from. Equipped with a 24.4 inch long drainage pipe for more convenient drainage.

【1 Year Hassle-free Replacement】 We stand by the quality and versatility of our foldable mini washing machine.Your satisfaction is our NO.1 priority. If you are not satisfied our mini washer machine, please feel free to tell us, and we will provide you a satisfied solution.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for Baby Items
reviews.reviewText: We just had a newborn recently, and she's been going through clothes, bibs, and burp clothes like mad. I wanted something small to do the essentials on a daily basis instead of running our normal washer with very few items inside. On average, I'm able to fit 10 bibs and 2 burp clothes, or 4 onesies with a handful of burp clothes or bibs.I have mine near the kitchen sink, and fill with hot tap water for the wash. I'll load up the items, fill with water to the top of the rubber flexible portion (where the color changes on mine from dark purple to light purple), and add 1 tsp tide soap. Run for the 10 min cycle and drain the dirty water. I then spin dry the clothes in the little basket, and refill with clean cold water for the rinse. Run again for 10 min, drain, and spin dry.The wash cycle is honestly pretty effective with cleaning the clothes. The spin dry is a bit difficult to use as the washer tends to bounce around the counter. I find that I need to hold it down for it to work properly. You might have better luck just hand wringing out the clothes instead.Overall, it works for what I need it to do, which is washing small batches of baby clothes every other day. I see this as a device perfect for kid's and baby's items. Sure beats hand washing!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Waste of money
reviews.reviewText: Because this only spins, it doesn’t actually wash anything. It doesn’t agitate back and forth. It goes through a ton of water, and it’s difficult not to get water everywhere. It’s very small. I washed one pillowcase. Definitely could not have washed two!The instructions are entertaining in a sad sort of way. We’ve all seen the poorly translated instructions. These take the cake. Example: “to avoid producing crystal due to the high temperature heat deformation, who were into the whole bad.”

reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Portable wash machine. Purple
reviews.reviewText: I can't figure out the white basket, that sits inside the tub. Is it suppose to stay in or remove to wash and then use to spin dry. I got it in, but can't get it back out. Please advise.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Small Compact and Cute!
reviews.reviewText: Great for washing small pieces of clothing. T shirts underwear, leggings, hats, small towels etc. really awesome for my small apartment. I bought this a month ago and I use mine almost daily. Surprisingly, one of my most favorite purchases this year for sure. At the time I purchased this little washer it barely had 3 stars so I was skeptical. I’m really happy I took the chance and got it despite the negative complaints I saw in the reviews. Just don’t over load it with large amounts of clothes and it definitely won’t wash your jeans or anything like that! lol

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I only used this washing machine four times.I didn't overload it and cleaned it after each use.I had problems getting it to come on from the beginning.After the first time I put in the spin basket it wouldn't come out so the next three times of usage I could only wash what could fit in that basket. Only two period panties or three wash cloths.After that fourth time of using it I could not get it to come back on to rinse the soap out and finally gave up and rinsed the items out by hand.My wonderful other half through away the box it came in so I'm pretty sure it's good for nothing but the trashcan now.I definitely wouldn't recommend this mini portable washing machine. It's a waste of money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I had just completed a trip to the keys in August and the laundry was a tad expensiv in the campground. I had seen these on tick tock and I looked on Amazon for one. I decided to get this one for camping trips. It's a bit cold right now for camping so I decided to unbox it and check it out. As you can see it's footprint is pretty small folded up. The manufacturer has thought of everything. There is a drain hose and a plastic hanger as well as clothes pins. The instructions are quite clear and it's very straightforward. I can see these being used in a college dorm as well.

reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Does not even work well
reviews.reviewText: I was so excited to use it but it does not function well. Better to hand wash. The dry function with the small basket does not work well either. I ended up habd washing and twisting the clothes to get water out so made more work.
